title: Daddy, I Want This Mommy - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Josei   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Business Management   Childcare   Cute Children   Doting Parents   Family Business   Family Conflict   Female Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Modern Day   Revenge   Sibling Rivalry   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Single Parent   Wealthy Characters
author: Mingyue Erliang   明月二两
description:
The little boy said persistently: I want to adopt you, you touch my head, you are responsible to me!

Xia YuQing: …who raises who!

For the sake of having a relationship with the little boy, she stayed to take care of him for the time being. What's more surprising is that his father is also a peculiar flower. She realized she was deeply in love when she regained her memory...>
